install.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ci_news` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `title` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL , `uri` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL , `lang` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL , `body` TEXT NOT NULL , `allow_comments` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `comments` int(4) NOT NULL, `status` INT(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `date` INT NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) , INDEX ( `title` ) );
